english.segment1: If I was your love I would want only you. I'd lay at this alter, give all I am, all that is true.
english.segment2: And this old scarlet letter won't keep me from holding you. There is nothing you can do. Nothing you do.
english.segment3: For love I have scaled the face of these kingdom walls. So let down your hair, let our kiss make fools of them all.
english.segment4: And this old scarlet letter won't keep me from holding you. And there is nothing you can do. Nothing you do.
